chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
orig_base_params: BaseParams
one_node_params: OneNodeParams orig_base_params
raft_params: RaftParams orig_base_params
oiai: output_implies_applied_interface
client: clientId
id: nat
i: input

Goal:
forall (client : clientId) (id : nat) (i : input) (net : network) (e : entry) (p : packet) (es : list entry), mEntries (pBody p) = Some es -> In p (nwPackets net) -> correct_entry client id i e -> In e es -> applied_implies_input_state client id i net

Premises:
Record OneNodeParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_OneNodeParams { init : data; handler : input -> data -> output * data } Arguments Build_OneNodeParams _ _ _%function_scope
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
Record entry (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Type := mkEntry { eAt : name; eClient : clientId; eId : nat; eIndex : logIndex; eTerm : term; eInput : input } Arguments entry {orig_base_params raft_params} Arguments mkEntry {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _ _%nat_scope
Record output_implies_applied_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_output_implies_applied_interface { output_implies_applied : forall (client : clientId) (id : nat) (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (tr : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), step_failure_star step_failure_init (failed, net) tr -> key_in_output_trace client id tr -> in_applied_entries client id net } Arguments output_implies_applied_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_output_implies_applied_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
applied_implies_input_state = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (i : input) (net : network) => exists e : entry, correct_entry client id i e /\ ((exists h : Net.name, In e (log (nwState net h))) \/ (exists (p : packet) (entries : list entry), In p (nwPackets net) /\ mEntries (pBody p) = Some entries /\ In e entries)) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), clientId -> nat -> input -> network -> Prop
Record network (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) : Type := mkNetwork { nwPackets : list packet; nwState : Net.name -> data } Arguments network {P params} Arguments mkNetwork {P params} _%list_scope _%function_scope
clientId = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (RaftParams0 : RaftParams orig_base_params) => let (_, _, _, clientId, _) := RaftParams0 in clientId : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, RaftParams orig_base_params -> Type Arguments clientId {orig_base_params RaftParams}
input = fun BaseParams0 : BaseParams => let (_, input, _) := BaseParams0 in input : BaseParams -> Type Arguments input {BaseParams}
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
Record RaftParams (orig_base_params : BaseParams) : Type := Build_RaftParams { N : nat; input_eq_dec : forall x y : input, {x = y} + {x <> y}; output_eq_dec : forall x y : output, {x = y} + {x <> y}; clientId : Type; clientId_eq_dec : forall x y : clientId, {x = y} + {x <> y} } Arguments Build_RaftParams _ _%nat_scope (_ _)%function_scope [clientId]%type_scope _%function_scope
Record BaseParams : Type := Build_BaseParams { data : Type; input : Type; output : Type } Arguments Build_BaseParams (_ _ _)%type_scope
Inductive option (A : Type) : Type := Some : A -> option A | None : option A Arguments option _%type_scope Arguments Some {A}%type_scope a : rename Arguments None {A}%type_scope
correct_entry = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (i : input) (e : entry) => eClient e = client /\ eId e = id /\ eInput e = i : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), clientId -> nat -> input -> entry -> Prop Arguments correct_entry {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _%nat_scope
mEntries = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (p : msg) => match p with | AppendEntries _ _ _ _ entries _ => Some entries | _ => None end : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), msg -> option (list entry) Arguments mEntries {orig_base_params raft_params}
nwPackets = fun (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) (n : network) => let (nwPackets, _) := n in nwPackets : forall (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P), network -> list packet Arguments nwPackets {P params}
Record packet (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) : Type := mkPacket { pSrc : Net.name; pDst : Net.name; pBody : Net.msg } Arguments packet {P params} Arguments mkPacket {P params}
In : forall A : Type, A -> list A -> Prop
pBody = fun (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) (p : packet) => let (_, _, pBody) := p in pBody : forall (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P), packet -> Net.msg Arguments pBody {P params}
applied_implies_input_update_split : forall (client : clientId) (id : nat) (i : input) (net : network) (h : name) (d : data) (ps : list packet), applied_implies_input_state client id i {| nwPackets := ps; nwState := update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h d |} -> exists e : entry, correct_entry client id i e /\ (In e (log d) \/ (exists h0 : Net.name, In e (log (nwState net h0))) \/ (exists (p : packet) (es : list entry), In p ps /\ mEntries (pBody p) = Some es /\ In e es))

applied_implies_input : forall (client0 : clientId) (id0 : nat) (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (tr : list (Net.name * (input + list output))) (e : entry), step_failure_star step_failure_init (failed, net) tr -> eClient e = client0 -> eId e = id0 -> applied_implies_input_state client0 id0 (eInput e) net -> in_input_trace client0 id0 (eInput e) tr where ?orig_base_params : [orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params oiai : output_implies_applied_interface client : clientId id : nat i : input |- BaseParams] ?one_node_params : [orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params oiai : output_implies_applied_interface client : clientId id : nat i : input |-...

findAtIndex_elim : forall (l : list entry) (i : logIndex) (e : entry), findAtIndex l i = Some e -> i = eIndex e /\ In e l
entries_match_append : forall (xs ys es : list entry) (ple : entry) (pli : nat) (plt : term), sorted xs -> sorted ys -> sorted es -> entries_match xs ys -> (forall e1 e2 : entry, eIndex e1 = eIndex e2 -> eTerm e1 = eTerm e2 -> In e1 es -> In e2 ys -> (forall e3 : entry, eIndex e3 <= eIndex e1 -> In e3 es -> In e3 ys) /\ (pli <> 0 -> exists e4 : entry, eIndex e4 = pli /\ eTerm e4 = plt /\ In e4 ys)) -> (forall i : nat, pli < i <= maxIndex es -> exists e : entry, eIndex e = i /\ In e es) -> (forall e : entry, In e es -> pli < eIndex e) -> findAtIndex xs pli = Some ple ->...-> entries_match (es ++ removeAfterIndex xs pli) ys
output_implies_applied : forall (client : clientId) (id : nat) (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (tr : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), step_failure_star step_failure_init (failed, net) tr -> key_in_output_trace client id tr -> in_applied_entries client id net

findAtIndex = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fix findAtIndex (entries : list entry) (i : logIndex) {struct entries} : option entry := match entries with | [] => None | e :: es => if eIndex e =? i then Some e else if eIndex e <? i then None else findAtIndex es i end : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), list entry -> logIndex -> option entry Arguments findAtIndex {orig_base_params raft_params} _%list_scope

raft_net_invariant_append_entries_reply = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (xs : list packet) (p : packet) (ys : list packet) (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (d : raft_data) (m : list (name * msg)) (t : nat) (es : list entry) (res : bool), handleAppendEntriesReply (pDst p) (nwState net (pDst p)) (pSrc p) t es res = (d, m) -> pBody p = AppendEntriesReply t es res -> P net -> raft_intermediate_reachable net -> nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys ->...-> Prop Arguments raft_net_invariant_append_entries_reply {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
raft_net_invariant_client_request = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (h : name) (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (out : list raft_output) (d : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (c : input), handleClientRequest h (nwState net h) client id c = (out, d, l) -> P net -> raft_intermediate_reachable net -> (forall h' : name, st' h' = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h d h') ->...-> Prop Arguments raft_net_invariant_client_request {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope

filter_rel : (forall x y : ?A, {?rel x y} + {~ ?rel x y}) -> ?A -> list ?A -> list ?A where ?A : [orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params oiai : output_implies_applied_interface client : clientId id : nat i : input |- Type] ?rel : [orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params oiai : output_implies_applied_interface client : clientId id : nat i : input |- Relation_Definitions.relation ?A]
key_in_output_trace = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (tr : list (name * (raft_input + list raft_output))) => exists (os : list raft_output) (h : name), In (h, inr os) tr /\ key_in_output_list client id os : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), clientId -> nat -> list (name * (raft_input + list raft_output)) -> Prop Arguments key_in_output_trace {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _%nat_scope _%list_scope

removeAfterIndex_le_In : forall (xs : list entry) (i : nat) (x : entry), eIndex x <= i -> In x xs -> In x (removeAfterIndex xs i)
adjacent_to_dec : forall x y : Net.name, {adjacent_to x y} + {~ adjacent_to x y} where ?P0 : [orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params oiai : output_implies_applied_interface client : clientId id : nat i : input |- BaseParams] ?P : [orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params oiai : output_implies_applied_interface client : clientId id : nat i : input |- MultiParams ?P0] ?NameOverlayParams : [orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params oiai : output_implies_applied_interface client : clientId id : nat i : input |- NameOverlayParams ?P]
findAtIndex_index : forall (l : list entry) (i : logIndex) (e' : entry), findAtIndex l i = Some e' -> i = eIndex e'
maxIndex_is_max : forall (l : list entry) (e : entry), sorted l -> In e l -> maxIndex l >= eIndex e

RIR_handleMessage : forall (p : packet) (net : network) (xs ys : list packet) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (d : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> handleMessage (pSrc p) (pDst p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (d, l) -> nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> (forall h : name, st' h = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d h) -> (forall p' : packet, In p' ps' -> In p' (xs ++ ys) \/ In p' (send_packets (pDst p) l)) -> raft_intermediate_reachable {| nwPackets := ps'; nwState := st' |}
Inductive raft_intermediate_reachable (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : network -> Prop := RIR_init : raft_intermediate_reachable step_async_init | RIR_step_failure : forall (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (failed' : list Net.name) (net' : network) (out : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> step_failure (failed, net) (failed', net') out -> raft_intermediate_reachable net' | RIR_handleInput : forall (net : network) (h : name) (inp : raft_input) (out : list raft_output) (d : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)) (ps' : list packet) (st' : name -> data), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> handleInput h inp (nwState net h) = (out, d...
raft_net_invariant_request_vote = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (xs : list packet) (p : packet) (ys : list packet) (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (d : raft_data) (m : msg) (t : nat) (cid : name) (lli llt : nat), handleRequestVote (pDst p) (nwState net (pDst p)) t (pSrc p) lli llt = (d, m) -> pBody p = RequestVote t cid lli llt -> P net -> raft_intermediate_reachable net -> nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys ->...-> Prop Arguments raft_net_invariant_request_vote {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
raft_invariant_handle_message : forall (P : network -> Prop) (xs : list packet) (p : packet) (ys : list packet) (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (d : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)), raft_net_invariant_append_entries P -> raft_net_invariant_append_entries_reply P -> raft_net_invariant_request_vote P -> raft_net_invariant_request_vote_reply P -> handleMessage (pSrc p) (pDst p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (d, l) -> P net -> raft_intermediate_reachable net -> nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> (forall h : name, st' h = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d h) ->...-> P {| nwPackets := ps'; nwState := st' |}
raft_net_invariant_do_leader = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (d : raft_data) (h : name) (os : list raft_output) (d' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)), doLeader d h = (os, d', ms) -> P net -> raft_intermediate_reachable net -> nwState net h = d -> (forall h' : name, st' h' = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h d' h') -> (forall p : packet, In p ps' -> In p (nwPackets net) \/ In p (send_packets h ms)) ->...-> Prop Arguments raft_net_invariant_do_leader {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope

```
intros client id i net e p es H1 H2 H3 H4 H5 H6.
unfold applied_implies_input_state.
intros orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params client0 id0 i0 net0 H.
destruct H as [e' [H7 H8]].
exists e'.
split.
- destruct H8 as [[h H9] | [p' [entries [H10 [H11 H12]]]]].
  + destruct H7 as [H13 H14].
    split.
    * apply H13.
    * left. apply H14.
  + destruct H7 as [H13 H14].
    split.
    * apply H13.
    * right. right. exists p', entries. auto.
- assumption.
